title: Song of the Sea
description: The player must assemble a group of skilled sailors and navigate a treacherous sea filled with monsters and mysteries to find a legendary island of untold riches.
subquest: Recruit a skilled navigator to guide the journey at sea.
Gather a diverse crew with unique abilities and strengths.
Overcome the challenges of powerful sea monsters lurking beneath.
Solve the riddles of ancient maps to navigate to the island.
Uncover the secrets hidden on the legendary island of riches.
Defend the treasure from rival pirates attempting to claim it.
